metadata.name: La Promenade - dancet
metadata.description:
Questioning how would Monet work with new art forms.

How would Monet experience dance and video forms?

In this art form, I am exercising on these questions with using my own dance footage with colors & feelings of Monet. 

Changing the perspective a bit & leaving the real nature sounds on the piece to create a living, animated oil print that will merge classic & new age world together. 

I wanted to share a feeling of the peace brought by an old piece mixing with my slow but intentional movements that enjoys nature.
